metadata.name: Private Keys Reconnaissance Via CommandLine Tools
metadata.comment: Adversaries may search for private key certificate files on compromised systems for insecurely stored credential

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.key')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pgp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ppk')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.p12')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pfx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cer')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.p7b')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.asc'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dir ')) OR (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-childitem ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\findstr.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('findstr.exe')))

output.summary: Adversaries may search for private key certificate files on compromised systems for insecurely stored credential
